english.segment1: Once upon a time. Not so long ago. Tommy used to work on the docks. Union's been on strike. He's down on his luck. it's tough, so tough
english.segment2: Gina works the diner all day. Working for her man, she brings home her pay. For love - For love. She says we've got to hold on to what we've got. it doesn't make a diffrence if we make it or not. we've got each other . and that's a lot For love - we'll give it a shot
english.segment3: Chorus: Whooah, we're half way there. Livin' on a prayer. Take my hand we'll make it. I swear. Livin' on a prayer
english.segment4: Tommy's got his six string hock. Now he's holding in what he used. to make it talk. so tough, it's so tough
english.segment5: Gina dreams of running away. when she cries in the night. Tommy whispers baby it's okay, someday. We've got to hold on to what we've got. 'cause it doesn't make a difference. if we make it or not. We've got each other and that's a lot. For love - we'll give it a shot
english.segment7: We've got to hold on ready or not. You live for the fight when it's all that you've got
